website_summaries.verdict: Long-lasting light in a portable tight package.
pros: Unique PerfectFlow technology allows for a steady fuel stream in any weather condition
Lights with matches and has adjustable brightness levels
Don't leave home to go camping without this powerful 2-mantle propane lantern
cons: Lantern is smaller than normal, and may cause it to be easily lost in foliage and at night

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off during use
customer_reviews.text: Tested the lantern before our camping trip. Everything worked well. Once on site, one of the fasteners for the handle fell off, crashing the lantern to the ground and breaking a mantle. Disappointed, as Coleman has generally been a trustworthy brand since I was a kid. I still got some use out of it during our camping trip once I bought replacement mantles, but I didn't purchase this item and not be able to use the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Barragan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle and could work much better.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use this for a while after purchasing(bought for an upcoming camping trip) and I did not realize it was missing it’s handle. This was a pretty big let down but can easily be fixed. The main problem with the lantern is the control knob. The bottom half(lower intensity) does not work. The light will go out below the halfway point and late at night 50% is a bit bright.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. Coleman makes everything in China now. Works well on our last camping trip. The only thing that is not working right is the level at which you can tune the output. There is no low light output. Its either High very high or one setting at low, if you move the knob to past the medium spot the lamp turns off.
customer_reviews.author: MAudio

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control at manufacture.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the Coleman QuickPack Deluxe Propaine Lanterns. The first one was not manufactured correctly and top screw would not connect to top nut to secure top of lantern. Ended up throwing on trash. The second one the storage case would not latch closed. Had to use duct tape to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well but makes a slight whistling sound. I don't like the way the valve clicks into place because you can't fine tune the light. For the price it's a great value and the case really does keep the glass protected. I dropped it from about 4 feet on hard dirt while it was in the case and it didn't break. I also don't like how the propane tank doesn't fit snug into the stand. You have to pick the stand up and move it when you move the lantern. I bought it as a secondary lantern for camping and it worked fine. The propane lanterns with mantles are the best in my opinion. They're very bright and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Dom M

customer_reviews.title: Love my Coleman propane lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Coleman propane lantern. I have had the same single mantel and double mantle Colman gas lanterns since I was a kid and they are still going strong. Decided to give this propane lantern a try and am very happy I did. I haven't used it a whole lot yet, but haven't had any problems with it whatsoever. Hope it lasts like my old gas ones. I had a spare Coleman spark igniter that, with a few modifications, mounted up and works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: alaskakidz

customer_reviews.title: A few points on the lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Bright lantern and good for the money. The carrying case is made of plastic but is rugged enough that I trust it to protect the lantern from most bumps. The bail(handle) is an odd shape to allow it to lay on the outside of the case making the bail very non-ergonomic. Will not work with the aftermarket spark igniter found on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact propane lateren
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 4 main stars because I'm a fan of the coleman white gas. But for a propane lantern it works awesome and is easy to use. It compacts down to a small size east to store. And when it's put away it had a hard plastic case to protect the glass globe
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy ownby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap not inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Pretty hokey. Has an instruction tag for the igniter, aaaand no igniter. Don't think this model is supposed to come with one, so... Cheap, but no other manufacturer is any better. Certainly won't be "throwing" this in with gear.
customer_reviews.author: twaters

customer_reviews.title: Very, very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Worked great - for four or five minutes. Then the propane that had been leaking from somewhere around the valve ignited, creating a fireball of dripping melted plastic. I've had good luck with other Coleman products, but this one could have easily injured somebody badly or burned something down.
customer_reviews.author: Wrena

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern.  User friendly.
customer_reviews.text: We take these camping, it is easy to use, and very bright. It folds up great to save space. Got it at a lower price here than a few stores i saw it in. Will probably be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price. I prefer the soft warm glow of gas lighting vs the harsh cold light that most LED's put out. I bought this in addition to other Coleman lights I have. Really my only gripe with this lamp is the lack of the "Quick Start" but that is reflected in the price. I would have no problem recommending this as a secondary light source. I would recommend a lamp with and electronic ignition source for your primary light source.
customer_reviews.author: Photogeek1234

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works very well. Rugged and perfect for camping. The carry case is very good. Base does not stay attached to a can of propane so when you pick it up the base stays behind.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Church

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: This is our second lantern , we decided we needed two. The case protects and makes it easy to carry. A+++
customer_reviews.author: urban cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Quality control at Coleman not what it was.
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these lanterns, and 2 out of 3 of the valves leak slowly when shut off (and did so right out of the box) making it absolutely necessary to remove it from the tank, (or close the tank valve on a 20# tank) when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: The cover doesn't like to stay shut, but easily fixed with a twist tie. Love the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern. Only reason I gave it 4 stars in stead of 5 is because the protective case to store the glass in is very difficult to put on and keep in place. Had to add a bungee cord to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and showed up broken both times.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. I ordered this lantern and it showed up with the handle broken. We thought maybe it was due to the terrible packaging so we returned it and had them send a replacement. The second lantern showed up broken in the exact same way. The handle won't stay attached to the lantern. We thought it was and inexpensive lantern, but now we know it's just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jen025

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a camping trip it was easy to use just like the old one I had if I never went out again I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Barber

customer_reviews.title: Lights up very nicely
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty connecting it to my Standport pole, but one I did, lighting it was relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gosnell

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Coleman lantern
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Coleman lantern. My only issue is that one of the reviews below threw me off a little bit. The review said that the lantern has an ignitor. Obviously this lantern does not come with an ignition button. I guess it's my own fault, it's still a bummer. My old one was much easier to light due to that feature...
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ott

customer_reviews.title: Basic, cheap, and hard working.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a basic 2 mantle lantern, but it’s a workhorse. Inexpensive, simple, and works well. I’d love to have a fancier one, but I have no complaints at all with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David Helms

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but poor quality parts
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Coleman & their lanterns. I love the case and how it all fits together. I am disappointed in the quality. Our lantern handle has already fallen off after 3 uses. Without a handle this makes transporting the lantern while lit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Rohe

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lantern. I don't understand other reviews that mentioned the handle falling off. There are wings on the end of the handle that must be forcefully inserted through the rivets and then it is secure. Again, excellent lantern at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: modus77

customer_reviews.title: good price on a quality item
customer_reviews.text: good price on a quality item. self packaging protects when transporting. only complaint is that there are presets for the brightness of the lantern, you can't manually adjust and even on the lowest setting, its still pretty bright. not the worst thing to deal with, but would be nice to have a dimmer light at night when you want to enjoy the fire and still light a near by area.
customer_reviews.author: SCAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Portable, protected and compact.
customer_reviews.text: The "case" is a little tricky to open at first but once you get on to it, is simple. Like that it protects the lamp and takes up far less room than most Coleman's that come in a hard sided case.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaKitty

customer_reviews.title: I love Coleman camping stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love Coleman camping stuff ,They wrote the book on camping I believe! I bought this lantern to camp an fish with ,it works awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine and is super bright
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine and is super bright. Gets 4 stars because of lighting procedure. Great lamp but Coleman could do a better job on ways to light this lamp up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Coleman
customer_reviews.text: A great replacement for the original lantern with the broken globe. Great quality only from a Coleman product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Classic Coleman propane lantern, did not disappoint! Couple of night fishing trips, and outdoor excursions and still going strong! Love these lanterns!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Reza

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp with propane tank connection
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp with propane tank connection. Make sure to get extra mantles to the campsite in case they are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandopui

customer_reviews.title: It was scary at first since it was so loud and sounds like something is wrong
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very bright and loud. It was scary at first since it was so loud and sounds like something is wrong, but it worked well and gave off a good amount of light for the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Fish Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Great lighting. I have two and this lamp lights up much brighter than a battery powered camping lamp. It does run very hot so you cannot touch it like you can a battery powered lamp.
customer_reviews.author: E. Larry Grine

customer_reviews.title: I love how small and compact this product is
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and compact this product is. It provides great lighting. Would definitely recommend. (Buy the propane tanks from Walmart, they have the best deals on them)
customer_reviews.author: Ghaz

customer_reviews.title: great light, kinda clunky
customer_reviews.text: Pain to initially unpack and the enclosure doesn't really stay closed well. The handle pops off a lil too easily. But it is real easy to use and very very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Lantern!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago. I was a little hesitant but very glad I did. It works great and is so easy to use. It is very bright and lit up our entire camp area. you will not have a lack of light with this and the fuel last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MMT-Red

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern. The storage container works really well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lantern. The storage container works really well and looks like it will provide protection to the lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Spencer

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to figure out how to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to figure out how to get it out of it's case and together but ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: The outside case could be better at snapping shut
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The outside case could be better at snapping shut, but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Saucey

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LAMP
customer_reviews.text: Good brightness range, the case prevents damage in storage and travel
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great when we have a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Del Turco

customer_reviews.title: a gift for new campers
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for the son and daughter-in-law. they have found their way to rving and camping recently
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved this lantern especially the part where is closes down when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Coleman propane lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great lantern, just wish it had the spark igniter, but on a calm day it's not hard to light.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This lantern came just in time for our camping trip. It was nice and bright and didn’t attract too many bugs
customer_reviews.author: Brandy P.

customer_reviews.title: Bright Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this light is bright. Easy to light and burns for a long time. It is a basic part of my camping supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Janet O. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worst Coleman lantern ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst ever. Did not come with all parts, arrived damaged. Returning the item and will go buy it at the store so I can inspect it for damage and parts before I buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: We are in love with this lantern
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this lantern. we are so glad we got it at the price we did. it will last us our life.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan and Catie

customer_reviews.title: easy to light
customer_reviews.text: Clip on mantles, easy to light, very bright and convenient quickpack to protect the globe.
customer_reviews.author: Craig W. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I've gone on three camping trips already and I really liked it because it's compact, easy to set up and it's bright. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We hang it up and it does a great job around campsite
customer_reviews.text: Very bright lantern. We hang it up and it does a great job around campsite. Easy to sore and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product in its own case. transported great and lots of light
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great lantern. We would definitely but it again. I just wish it came with a hard travel case instead of having to buy them separately
customer_reviews.author: bs

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lantern, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the typical dual-mantle coleman lantern, except for an extremely cheap price. Like it's more expensive cousins, the amount of light produced by the lantern is really quite suprising. Ordinary oil lanterns, which do not use a mantle, "don't hold a candle" to lanterns like this that do. THis is a "must" for camping without access to electric lights, and vastly superior to just using flashlights (though you need those too). I plan to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Normal_Feet

customer_reviews.title: Bright as can be
customer_reviews.text: Bright and easy to use. I like the case it comes in, very easy to open and close. This is one of the best lanterns I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Ken and Barbie

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's good for the price. Does not have a quickstart option. It's made in China. Otherwise that it works pretty good in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping, easy to light and stayed the entire tim. It didn't use much propane. I still have almost a full bottle. And it was going for 2 nights till at least 1 am
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Warren

customer_reviews.title: Other than that great product. Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Received it missing the handle for the lantern. Other than that great product. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Wish I would have purchased the one with the auto ignite.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, bright... and they even give off a little bit of heat so two of them in an EZ-up tent can take a little chill out of the air...
customer_reviews.author: Lara K. in Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Bright but heavy and loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and reliable. Also bright! Like having a 120 watt bulb at your campsite. Kinda heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus J. Roxas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not well made on low setting makes weird noise and is generally flimsy. Would not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: jkane300

customer_reviews.title: Lantern melted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lantern in June and just used it for the first time this weekend. The lantern worked great in terms of the light it produced. However, after using it for just a few hours, the top part with the screw that needs to be removed in order to replace the mantels melted. It melted to the point of where we are now unable to replace the mantels when they burn out. I just emailed Amazon customer service, so we'll see how it goes. If it's replaced, this review will likely be edited. The product itself seems to be a good one, minus this issue.
customer_reviews.author: VM88

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Compelled to comment. I had this exact same product that I bought about 5 years or so ago. I lost it, so I had to buy a new one. Figured the one was great until I lost it, so buy the same thing again, no brainer. BUT it isn't the same thing. I don't know when it changed, but time to steer away from the trusty Coleman Lantern. This thing is poorly built crap. The handle barely works, and the lid requires mechanical engineering degree to operate. For shame Coleman! For shame! Profit isn't everything, make a good product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill, Eugene, OR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Toss out those other lamps, this will replace 2-3 battery operated.
customer_reviews.author: Tim98277

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp the only bummer is the stand doesn't stay on so you can't easily carry around and set it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: thlawson

customer_reviews.title: Nice lantern
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lantern easy to use and light. Very bright a little loud on high though. Take a small shepards hook to hang on perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen davis

customer_reviews.title: it is a coleman, want can you say. ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a coleman, want can you say.... works as described but case comes open a little easier than it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the case and brightest lantern I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Palakiko

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for camping and it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as stated in the ad. We used this for camping and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Conkle

customer_reviews.title: Classic The case is a bit bulky, the lantern ...
customer_reviews.text: Classic The case is a bit bulky, the lantern it self is excatly what you remember.
customer_reviews.author: ryan robertson

customer_reviews.title: They are the best you don't need my review to know that
customer_reviews.text: Come on its a Coleman lantern. They are the best you don't need my review to know that.
customer_reviews.author: Iisundownii

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and I really like the carrying case that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Athelsten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: getting ready for hurricane season and I love these lanterns
customer_reviews.author: Bettye Evans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the new laters, and the cases quick easy use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are safe great to use
customer_reviews.text: If you and got it you need to get it.they are safe great to use.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another wonderful Coleman product! Every family must have one of this
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Flo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The lantern did not have a carry handle and you must light with a match,it won't start electronically
customer_reviews.author: A. Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was broke when I got it in will be sending back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman QuickPack 967 Lumens Lantern
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to store.. Love this lantern when you need a little bit more light. Works great for the price
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Works but l prefer the older design.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok but l don't particularly care for the fact that the base does not fit propane cylinders snuggly. My older ones fit very snug and secure. This one is apparently intended to remain completely loose. The cylinder drops into it and pulls right out. I much prefer the tight fitting older design that once pushed together can be moved around as one piece. Also, the knob has notched intensity positions instead of a smooth dim to bright adjustment like the older model. Ug. Well, the price makes up for some of this.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Kuban

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lantern!! QuickPack fits nice in the trunk or backpack
customer_reviews.author: ScottyCOAngler™

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Good old fashioned small camping lantern. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: The lantern came in dented on the top, as though it was dropped. When you look at the lantern it looks tilted/uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A LEddy

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a gas powered lantern before, so this is my first. I burned off the mantles as instructed, nothing special here. Attached the lantern to a, inserted a flame from aand turned on the lantern. PROS: Easy to use, uses standard #21 mantles, no pumping, no clean-up or mess like liquid style lanterns, base/case is great protection, cost per time used is much cheaper than batteries. CONS: Openings at base not large enough to put lighter stem inside, much more heat generated than battery powered lantern, plastic base seems thin and fragile. Time will tell about durability.
customer_reviews.author: jdfletch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lanterns arrived on time, but one of the lanterns is missing a handle
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: I received the lantern in record time and in excellent condition. It worked in typical Coleman fashion....perfectly. and exactly as advertised. I really like the way they integrated the case to protect the glass globe. Under normal conditions, it just cannot be broken.
customer_reviews.author: janet t. abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great all around lantern and a good case to carry & store it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Coleman lantern
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this lantern packs up. Needed to replace an older Coleman and this did the trick. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: regularamazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good lantern
customer_reviews.text: A nice lantern. Only flaw is it doesnt have electric ignitor. But cant complain, ill use a match. Very bright and sturdy carrying case too. Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is awesome. It is very bright and has a nice range of brightness settings. We used it for many hours camping and it burns fuel pretty slowly, about 1/2 a can over a 5-6 hour period on med-high.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Got my monies worth. The requlator has only about 2 settings and while it appears to be infinitely adjustable it's not
customer_reviews.author: OldthorTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good Ole Coleman
customer_reviews.text: You can find this same lantern at most stores about $5.00 cheaper but we did get it delivered to our house! With gas at $4.00 a gallon I think it was a steal. I like the hard case very much, it takes up less room than the older square version.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lazzy

customer_reviews.title: Two defective lanterns in a row, bad product
customer_reviews.text: This unit is bad, very bad. Received the lantern and the screw on top was loose, once the top lid was remove it cannot be secure. I figure it was not a big issue and ask for a replacement when I received the second unit the same problem. These are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Lantern works but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The lantern works fine however when we opened it from the package it had multiple big paint scratches and a dent. Unfortunately we got it the day we were going camping and we needed to use it ASAP so we didn’t send it back. In the future I may just buy it from the store where I can physically see its condition before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jordan nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 years; So from experience I can say...Good price, VERY bright light, Clever storage design, uses standard propane tanks that are widely available, Propane lasts a LONG time at full power. Mantles are easy to replace, and are widely available. It loses one star for: A. The base that holds it up. (Design could be better) and B. Manual lighting is "Shocking" if not done right (POOF). But it is a GREAT lantern, so much so, that I bought another one. (One that has a "Push-to-Light" button) MUCH BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: RRichmond

customer_reviews.title: Where were the engineers?
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a built-in igniter...there isn't any. I then bought a Coleman igniter to use as an add on...which does not fit this model. The base is loose when using a standard 1 lb propane tank...must hand carry the base along with the lantern to any destination. To remove the nut that holds the top in place required a vice-grip since the nut was stripped by the mfg when assembled. The gas valve is not smooth, but jumps to the next level. I suggest an engineering review on models before going into production.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mantle fell apart when I tried to light it as directed. Went to KMart and bought replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A. Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: no bail included with mine
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the lantern yet, so can't comment on it's quality but mine was delivered without a bail (handle). So it's pretty much useless for the car camping trip I planned to use it on. I'm going to rig something up with a coat hangar and spend the $12 to order a new bail (inc. delivery) from Coleman for the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sharanya M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I love the case it comes in.....I can't wait to try it out
customer_reviews.author: cnevins921

product_meta.title: Coleman QuickPack Deluxe Propane Lantern
product_meta.description: Make packing up your lantern as easy as possible with the Coleman QuickPack Deluxe Propane Lantern. The 2-mantle design of this lantern creates a steady, bright glow of up to 1000 lumens of light that reaches up to 22 meters away. A quick match strike is all you need to get your lantern started, then simply dial in the perfect brightness with the adjustable control knob. Once your lantern is lit, the wide base provides stability when placed on a table, and the bail handle allows for easy hanging. No matter where you go, the PerfectFlow pressure-control technology produces a steady fuel stream and consistent performance in all kinds of weather. When you're ready to head home, the QuickPack storage system helps get you on your way quickly, since the lantern base is also the bottom of your case. Just place the outer cover and you're all packed up until you're ready for your next bright adventure.
feature_bullets: Powerful 2-mantle propane lantern ideal for camping and outdoor adventures
PerfectFlow technology provides steady fuel stream in all weather conditions
Lights with a match; adjustable brightness
Wide base for stability also doubles as bottom of carry case
Lasts up to 13.5 hours on 16.4 oz. propane cylinder (sold separately)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
